solution_line_template: First finding the time to fold the dough and let it rest one time: {fold_time_per_instance} minutes + {rest_time_per_instance} minutes = <<{fold_time_per_instance}+{rest_time_per_instance}={time_per_fold_rest_cycle}>>{time_per_fold_rest_cycle} minutes

Then find the total time spent folding and resting the dough: {time_per_fold_rest_cycle} minutes/time * {num_folds} times = <<{time_per_fold_rest_cycle}*{num_folds}={total_fold_rest_time}>>{total_fold_rest_time} minutes

Then add the mixing and baking time: {total_fold_rest_time} minutes + {baking_time} minutes + {mixing_time} minutes = <<{total_fold_rest_time}+{baking_time}+{mixing_time}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes

Then divide that number by the number of minutes per hour to find the total time in hours: {total_minutes} minutes / {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hour = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours
